00020 
00021 #ifndef BYTEBUFFER_H_
00022 #define BYTEBUFFER_H_
00023 
00024 #include "Common.h"
00025 #include "../IO/InputStream.h"
00026 #include "../IO/OutputStream.h"
00027 
00028 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00029 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00030 
00034 class ByteBuffer : public InputStream, public OutputStream {
00035     friend OutputStream& operator<<(OutputStream&, ByteBuffer&);
00036     friend InputStream& operator>>(InputStream&, ByteBuffer&);
00037 public:
00038     enum Traits {
00039         Closed = 0x00,
00040         Read = 0x01,
00041         Write = 0x02,
00042         ReadWrite = 0x03,
00043         RW = ReadWrite
00044     };
00045     ByteBuffer(Traits traits = RW, size_t bufsize = 16);
00046     ByteBuffer(const Array<byte> & ar);
00047     ByteBuffer(const ByteBuffer& orig);
00048     virtual ~ByteBuffer();
00049 
00050     // common methods
00051     
00052     fsize_t available() const;
00053     void close();
00054     bool eof() const;
00055     bool markSupported() const { return true; }
00056     void mark(fsize_t);
00057     fsize_t skip(fsize_t);
00058     void reset();
00059     size_t size() const;
00060     void clear();
00061     
00062     // traits modifiers
00063     
00064     void setTraits(Traits traits);
00065 
00066     // Read methods
00067     InputStream& operator>>(byte& b);
00068 
00069     // Write methods and operators
00070     OutputStream& operator<<(const byte b);
00071 
00072     ByteBuffer& fromString(const String s);
00073 
00074     // Operators:
00075     ByteBuffer& operator=(const ByteBuffer & rhs);
00076 
00077     // Convertors:
00078     
00079     Array<byte> toArray();
00080     const Array<byte> toArray() const;
00081 
00082     operator Array<byte>();
00083     operator const Array<byte>() const;
00084 private:
00085     void ensureCapacity(size_t capacity);
00086     Array<byte> _array;
00087     idx_t _pos;
00088     size_t _size;
00089     Traits _traits;
00090     idx_t _mark;
00091     size_t _markExpires;
00092 };
00093 
00094 OutputStream& operator<<(OutputStream&, ByteBuffer&);
00095 InputStream& operator>>(InputStream&, ByteBuffer&);
00096 
00097 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00098 
00099 #endif  /* BYTEBUFFER_H_ */
